block.p: Lori Aeryn Flanagan, the daughter of Gloria and Edward W. Flanagan Sr. of New Canaan, Conn., was married yesterday to James Burton Vincent, a son of Sue Vincent and Dr. Joseph Vincent of Santa Barbara, Calif. The Rev. John Vigilanti performed the ceremony at St. Patrick's Roman Catholic Church in Bedford, N.Y.
Mr. and Mrs. Vincent graduated from Vanderbilt University, she magna cum laude and he cum laude.

Lori Aeryn Flanagan, the daughter of Gloria and Edward W. Flanagan Sr. of New Canaan, Conn., was married yesterday to James Burton Vincent, a son of Sue Vincent and Dr. Joseph Vincent of Santa Barbara, Calif. The Rev. John Vigilanti performed the ceremony at St. Patrick's Roman Catholic Church in Bedford, N.Y.
Mr. and Mrs. Vincent graduated from Vanderbilt University, she magna cum laude and he cum laude.

The bride, 25, is a public relations director for Anne Bowen Couture, an evening wear designer in New York. Her parents own Lincoln Park Realty, a real estate management company in New Canaan and New York.

The bridegroom, 28, is an institutional stock salesman at Sanford C. Bernstein & Company, the investment management firm in New York. His father is an ophthalmologist in Santa Barbara. The bridegroom's mother is the president of the Assistance League of Santa Barbara, a charity.
